snippet: The Hawks lost forward Paul Millsap to an injury, but they set a franchise record for wins with Saturday’s victory over the Nets, whose six-game winning streak ended.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Atlanta Hawks defeat Brooklyn Nets, 131-99, to match franchise record of 57 wins; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Hawks lost forward Paul Millsap to an injury, but they set a franchise record for wins with Saturday’s victory over the Nets, whose six-game winning streak ended.

headline.print_headline: Hawks Tie Team Record for Wins by Routing Nets
headline.main: Hawks Tie Team Record for Wins by Routing Nets
